sentences.sContent: So on this solemn day, at this sacred hour, once more we pause.
sentences.sCn: 在这庄严的日子，在这个神圣的时刻，让我们再一次停顿一下。

sentences.sContent: At this moment, in this election, we must pledge once more to march into the future.
sentences.sCn: 在这一时刻，在这次选举中，我们必须再一次保证，向未来挺进。

sentences.sContent: Today that dream has not vanished altogether, but the single market is under threat once more.
sentences.sCn: 今天，这一梦想尚未完全消失，但统一市场却再一次处于威胁之中。
